help.description: Adds one or more groups to the current {{groups}}, {{exclude}}, or {{include}} options.

example.exclude: Adds {{groupOne}}, {{groupTwo}}, and {{groupThree}} to the current {{exclude}} option
example.groups: Adds {{groupOne}} and {{groupTwo}} to the current {{groups}} option

help.description: Choose how to answer: by typing your answer, or via multiple choice. Options are the following: `{{typing}}`, `{{typingtypos}}`, `{{easy}}`, `{{medium}}`, and `{{hard}}`

example.multipleChoice: Click on the button from {{optionCount}} multiple choice options to guess. {{penalty}} EXP penalty will be applied
example.typing: Type your answer in the chat to guess
example.typingTypos: Type your answer in the chat to guess. Small typos will be marked as correct. {{penalty}} EXP penalty will be applied

interaction.description: Choose how to answer: by typing your answer, or via multiple choice

help.description: Choose whether you'd like to hear from soloists, groups, or both. Options are the following: {{soloists}}, {{groups}}, and {{both}}.

example.both: Plays songs from both soloists and groups
example.reset: Resets the artist type option

interaction.description: Choose whether you'd like to hear from soloists, groups, or both

noTeam.description: Create a team using `{{join}} [team name]` before you can start the game.

invalidEndYear.description: The end year must be after or equal to the start year.
invalidEndYear.title: Invalid End Year

help.description: Set a cutoff year range for songs. If one value is specified, only songs AFTER that year will be played. If two values are specified, only songs BETWEEN those two years will be played.

example.reset: Reset to the default cutoff of {{defaultBeginningSearchYear}} to {{defaultEndSearchYear}}
example.singleCutoff: Play songs released after the year {{year}}
example.twoCutoffs: Play songs released between the years {{beginningYear}}-{{endYear}}

interaction.description: Set a cutoff year range for songs
interaction.earliestOption: Pick songs for every year starting from [beginningYear]
interaction.rangeOption: Pick songs for every year between [beginningYear] and [endingYear]

debug.description:
If you were asked by a bot developer to do this, give them this:
{{debugID}}
debug.title: Debug Details Sent!

notSet.description: The duration is not currently set.

tooShort.description: The duration cannot be less than 2 minutes.

help.description: Sets a maximum length for the KMQ game in minutes.

example.decrement: Remove {{duration}} minutes from the current game's duration
example.increment: Add {{duration}} minutes to the current game's duration
example.reset: Disables the duration
example.set: The game will automatically end after {{duration}} minutes

help.description: Finishes the current game and decides on a winner.
Select as many groups that you would like to ignore, separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{groupList}}).

example.reset: Resets the exclude option

exp.bonusArtists: Guessing songs by the daily bonus artists
exp.bonusDescription: You can get bonus EXP for the following

explanation.bonusArtistGuess: Guessing correctly for a bonus artist
explanation.powerHour: Playing during a KMQ Power Hour or Weekend
explanation.streak: Having a guess streak of over 5

exp.firstGameOfDayBonus: First Game of the Day Bonus

help.description: Shows your current EXP modifier, and the list of current bonus EXP artists.

exp.title: EXP Bonuses

notOwner.description: Only the game owner ({{mentionedUser}}) can use force-hint.

help.description: The person that started the game can force-hint the current song, no majority necessary.

notOwner.description: Only the game owner ({{mentionedUser}}) can force-skip the current song.

help.description: The person that started the game can force-skip the current song, no majority necessary.

Choose the gender of the artists you'd like to hear from. Options are the following: {{male}}, {{female}}, and {{coed}}. Alternatively, use {{genderAlternating}} to rotate between male and female artists every round.

example.alternating: Alternate between male and female artists every round
example.coed: Play songs only from coed groups (groups with both male and female members)
example.female: Play songs only from female artists
example.maleFemale: Play songs from both male and female artists
example.reset: Reset to the default genders of male, female, and coed

gameOption.description: With only one group chosen, {{alternatingGenderCommand}} may not behave as expected. Consider including more groups to correctly alternate genders.
gameOption.title: Game Option Warning

gameOptionConflict.description: An {{elimination}} game is currently in progress. {{goal}} and {{elimination}} are incompatible. Play a {{classic}} or {{teams}} game to use {{goal}}.

goalExceeded.description: The given goal exceeds the highest score. Please raise your goal, or start a new game.
goalExceeded.title: Error Applying Goal

help.description: Once the player with the most points reaches the goal score, the game ends. Calling it with no arguments disables the goal. If a game is in progress, the goal must exceed the highest score.

example.reset: Disables the goal
example.set: The first player to {{goal}} wins the game

interaction.description: Once the player with the most points reaches the goal score, the game ends.

help.description: Select as many groups that you would like to hear from, separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{groupList}}).

example.reset: Resets the groups option

help.description: Choose whether to guess by song title, artist name, or both.

example.artist: Type the correct name of the artist to win a game round
example.both: Type the correct name of the artist (0.2 points) or the name of the song (1 point) to win a game round
example.reset: Reset to the default guess mode of {{defaultGuessMode}}
example.song: Type the correct song name to win a game round

help.description:
Type {{play}} in chat and the bot will play a random k-pop song in VC. The goal of this game is to be the first person to guess the song name in chat.
See your current game options with {{options}}. Use `{{help}} [{{command}}]` to get more details

failure.noDocs: Sorry, there is no documentation on {{action}}.

help.description: Get help about the game's commands. Add a command to get information about the specific command.

example.allCommands: Shows all available commands and a short description
example.sampleCommand: Shows a detailed description for the cutoff command

help.title: {{kmq}} Command Help

eliminated.description: Only alive players may request hints.

multipleChoice.description: You cannot request hints while playing multiple choice.

noSongPlaying.description: A hint can only be requested when a song is playing.

help.description: Gives a hint to the currently playing song.

Select as many groups that you would like to forcefully include, ignoring other filters ({{gender}}, {{artisttype}}, etc.), separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{groupList}}).

example.reset: Resets the include option

alreadyInTeam.description: You're already a member of this team.

badEmojis.description: You can only include emojis that are in this server.

invalidCharacters.description: Your team name consists of only invalid characters.

noTeamName.description: Include a team name to create a team or to join that team if it already exists (`{{joinCommand}} [team name]`)

afterGameStart.description: {{mentionedUser}} thinks they have what it takes to lead {{teamName}} to victory!

beforeGameStart.description: When everyone has joined a team, {{beginCommand}} the game!

help.description: Choose whether songs played should be exclusively in Korean.

example.korean: Plays only Korean songs. Ignores songs that are in foreign languages: English, Japanese, Chinese
example.reset: Reset to the default language of {{defaultLanguage}}

enrolled.description: Your name is now visible on the leaderboard.
enrolled.title: Leaderboard Enrollment Complete

alreadyEnrolled.description: You are already visible on the leaderboard. If you'd like to update your display name, unenroll and enroll again.
alreadyEnrolled.title: Player Already Enrolled

empty.description: No one has earned EXP in this time interval. Now's your chance to go for first place!
empty.title: Empty Leaderboard

noParticipants.description: Someone needs to score a point before this command works.
noParticipants.title: No Participants

outOfRange.description: The leaderboard doesn't go this far.

help.description: View the KMQ leaderboard.

example.enroll: Allows your name to be displayed on the leaderboard
example.gameMonthlyPage: Shows the 2nd page of the monthly scoreboard containing players with points in the current game
example.globalPage: Shows the 3rd page of the global leaderboard
example.globalWeeklyPage: Shows the 4th page of the leaderboard, by EXP gained this week
example.serverSongsGuessedPage: Shows the 3rd page of the server-wide leaderboard by total songs guessed
example.unenroll: Hides your name from the leaderboard

quote.name: Want your name to show up on the leaderboard? See {{command}}
quote.nextPage: Want to see the next page of the leaderboard? See {{command}}

unenrolled.description: You are no longer visible on the leaderboard.
unenrolled.title: Leaderboard Unenrollment Complete

validation.firstArg: Expected one of the following valid values for the first argument: (a positive number, {{typeOrScopeOrDuration}})
validation.secondArg: Expected one of the following valid values for the second argument: (a positive number, {{argument}})
validation.thirdArg: Expected a positive number for the third argument

greaterThanStart.description: End limit must be greater than the start limit.

greaterThanZero.description: End limit must be greater than 0.

help.description: Set a maximum number of results in the song query. This effectively sets the "Top X number of songs" based on the selected filters.

example.reset: Reset to the default limit of {{defaultLimit}}
example.singleLimit: Plays the top {{limit}} most listened songs from the currently selected options
example.twoLimits: Plays between the {{limitStart}} to {{limitEnd}} most listened songs from the currently selected options

interaction.description: Set a maximum number of results in the song query
interaction.description_range: This plays between the top [limit_start] and [limit_end] songs based on the selected filters.
interaction.description_top: This plays the top [limit] songs based on the selected filters.

groupsInFile.description: Too many groups to list in a Discord message, see the attached file.

noFilePermissions.description: Too many groups to list in a Discord message. The bot needs {{attachFile}} permissions to send the groups list file.

help.description: Displays the currently selected groups for a given game option.

locale.updatedDescription: The bot's language has been updated to `{{language}}`.

help.description: Check whether a given YouTube video is included KMQ's database and the current game options.

lookup.inKMQ: This song is included in KMQ! Here's the link to [Daisuki]({{link}}).

notFound.description: The requested song was not found in KMQ's copy of the Daisuki database, therefore it is not included in KMQ.
notFound.title: Song Not Found

lookup.notInKMQ: This song has an entry on [Daisuki]({{link}}), but it isn't included in KMQ.

songNameSearchResult.notFoundDescription: Could not find any songs by that name
songNameSearchResult.successDescription: The following songs are available in KMQ:
songNameSearchResult.title: Lookup Results

validation.invalidYouTubeID: Expected a valid YouTube ID or link.

help.description: Sets whether multiple people can guess a song correctly. When {{on}}, players will have 1.5 seconds after the first correct answer is given, to continue to answer. The first answer receives full EXP, correct answers that come after receive multiplicatively less EXP.

example.off: Only the first person who guesses correct is awarded the point
example.on: Allows for a 1.5 second grace period from when the first correct guess occurs. Multiple players are able to guess correctly
example.reset: Reset to the default multiguess type of {{defaultMultiguess}}

interaction.description: Sets whether multiple people can guess a song correctly

help.description: Displays the latest updates to KMQ.

updates.footer: Join the official KMQ server for more detailed updates!
updates.title: Updates

help.description: Displays the current game options.

options.listeningSessionNotAvailable: Some options are not available during a listening session
options.overview: Now playing the top {{limit}} out of {{totalSongs}} available songs from the following options:
options.perCommandHelp: Looking for information on how to use a command? Check out "{{helpCommand}} [command]" to learn more.
options.premiumOptionsNonPremiumGame: Note: active game is not premium
options.title: Options

help.description: Choose whether to include OST songs.

example.reset: Reset to the default option of {{defaultOst}}

exp.howToVote: See {{vote}} for info on how to vote. Thanks for supporting KMQ!

help.description: Starts a game of KMQ. Pick between classic (default), elimination mode, and teams mode.

example.classic: Start a classic game of KMQ (type in your guess first to get a point)
example.elimination: Start an elimination game of KMQ where each player starts with {{lives}} lives
example.teams: Split up into as many teams as you want and see who you can depend on to help you win!

interaction.lives: Choose how many lives each player starts with

joinTeam.description: Team leaders, type `{{join}} [team name]` to form a new team. Remember, switching teams mid-game will forfeit all your current score and EXP.

play.typeGuess: Listen to the song and type your guess!
play.voteReminder: Psst. Earn more EXP by voting (see {{vote}})

help.description: Find out more about KMQ Premium including whether you're currently a member.

option.description: This option can only be used by premium KMQ supporters.
option.description_kmq_server: This option can only be used by premium KMQ supporters, or in the official KMQ server.

description.connectionReminder: Make sure to connect your Discord account [here](https://www.patreon.com/settings/apps) to receive your perks.

badge.description: Show off your dedication to KMQ with an exclusive badge on your profile
badge.title: Premium Supporter Badge!

moreSongs.description: Gain access to the top 50 b-sides for every artist (up from 10)
moreSongs.title: More songs!

special.description: Change song playback speed anywhere you play!

exported.description:
Import {{presetName}} as a new preset in other servers using:
`{{presetImport}} {{presetUUID}} [preset_name]`

Alternatively, load the preset's options directly using:
`{{presetLoad}} {{presetUUID}}`
exported.title: Preset Exported

alreadyExists.description: Preset {{presetNameFormatted}} already exists. You can delete the old one with `{{presetDelete}} {{presetName}}`.
alreadyExists.title: Preset Already Exists

lengthyName.description: Preset name must be at most {{presetNameMaxLength}} characters.
lengthyName.title: Preset Name Too Long

missingIdentifier.description: You must specify a preset identifier. Use `{{presetExport}} [preset_name]` to retrieve a preset's identifier.
missingIdentifier.title: Preset Identifier Missing

missingName.description: You must specify a preset name.
missingName.title: Preset Name Missing

tooMany.description: Each guild may only have up to {{maxNumPresets}} presets. Please delete some before adding more.
tooMany.title: Too Many Presets

help.description: Various actions to save/load game option presets. Preset name must be one word long.

example.export: Returns a unique identifier that can be used to load/import the mentioned preset
example.import: Creates a new preset with name `preset_name` using an exported preset identifier ({{exampleIdentifier}})
example.list: Lists all of the server's presets
example.load: Loads the mentioned preset or preset identifier ({{exampleIdentifier}}) into the game options
example.replace: Replace the mentioned preset's options with the current game options
example.save: Saves the current game options as a preset

imported.description: Load the newly imported preset using `{{presetLoad}} {{presetName}}`.
imported.title: Preset Imported

noPresets.description: You have no presets. Refer to {{presetHelp}} to see how to create one.

savedOrReplaced.description: You can load this preset later with {{presetLoad}}.

badUsage.description: Make sure you're using this command correctly. See {{profileHelp}} for more details.

notFound.description: Could not find the specified user ID. See {{profileHelp}} for details.
notFound.title: No Profile Found

help.description: Shows your game stats.

noGroupsSelected.description: There are no groups currently selected.

help.description: Removes one or more groups from the current {{groups}}, {{exclude}}, or {{include}} options.

example.groups: Removes {{groupOne}} and {{groupTwo}} from the current {{groups}} option

help.description: Reset to the default game options.

example.reset: Resets to the default game options

help.description: See the scoreboard for the current game.
Choose whether each song is played from the beginning, middle, or at a random point.

example.beginning: Song will be played starting from the very beginning
example.middle: Songs will be played starting from the middle point
example.random: Songs will be played starting from a random point in the middle
example.reset: Reset to the default seek of {{defaultSeek}}

help.description: Choose how songs are shuffled.

example.popularity: Songs will play based on descending popularity. {{penalty}} EXP penalty will be applied
example.reset: Reset to the default shuffle mode of {{defaultShuffle}}

help.description: Vote to skip the current song. A song is skipped when majority of participants vote to skip it.
Modify the song playback speed.

example.fast: Plays the song at a fast speed
example.faster: Plays the song at a faster speed
example.highPitch: Plays the song at a high pitch
example.lowPitch: Plays the song at a low pitch
example.nightcore: Plays a nightcore edit of the song
example.reset: Reset the special option
example.slow: Plays the song at a slow speed

stats.footer: "Recent" statistics represent data from last 24 hours.

help.description: Various usage/system statistics.

stats.title: Bot Statistics

help.description: Choose whether to automatically include a group's subunits, when using {{groups}}.

example.include: Automatically include subunits. For example, `{{groupCommand}} {{parentGroup}}` would include songs by {{parentGroup}}, {{subunitOne}}, {{subunitTwo}}, etc.
example.reset: Reset to the default option of {{defaultSubunit}}

help.description: Try your best to guess correctly before the timer runs out! Enter a time in seconds, or give no arguments to disable.

example.reset: Disables the timer
example.set: In {{timer}} seconds, if no user has guessed correctly, the round ends and the next one begins automatically

interaction.description: Try your best to guess correctly before the timer runs out!

vote.description:
Vote for KMQ on [top.gg]({{voteLink}}) and you'll receive 2x EXP for an hour! You can vote once every {{voteResetDuration}} hours.

We'd appreciate it if you could also leave a [review]({{reviewLink}}).

help.description: Shows instructions on how to vote to receive 2x EXP for an hour.

fun.bigThreeDominance: Fun Fact: BTS, Blackpink and Twice combined account for {{bigThreeViews}} YouTube views, or {{proportion}}%!
fun.birthday: Fun Fact: {{name}}'s birthday is this month on {{formattedDate}}!
fun.companyByArtistCount: Fun Fact: {{company}} is the entertainment company with the {{ordinalNum}} most artists (including subunits and solo debuts) at {{num}} total!
fun.companyByArtistViews: Fun Fact: {{name}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed entertainment company with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.historicalGaonWeekly: Fun Fact: On this week in {{year}}, {{songName}} was the top charting song on the GAON Weekly charts!
fun.mostActiveYear: Fun Fact: {{year}} was the {{ordinalNum}} most active year in K-Pop with {{num}} music video releases!
fun.mostAnnualAwardShowWins: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has the {{ordinalNum}} most annual award show wins with {{wins}}!
fun.mostDebuts: Fun Fact: {{year}} had the {{ordinalNum}} most debuts with {{num}} groups debuting!
fun.mostGaonAppearances: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has placed on the GAON digital weekly charts the {{ordinalNum}} most times with {{appearances}} appearances!
fun.mostGaonFirsts: Fun Fact: {{artistName}} has topped the GAON digital weekly charts the {{ordinalNum}} most times with {{firstPlaceCount}} first place appearances!
fun.mostLikedGroup: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most liked group with {{likes}} total YouTube likes!
fun.mostLikedVideo: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most liked video with {{likes}} total YouTube likes!
fun.mostMVs: Fun Fact: {{artist}} has the {{ordinalNum}} most music videos with {{num}} on YouTube!
fun.mostMusicShowWins: Fun Fact: {{artist}} has won the {{ordinalNum}} most music shows with {{num}} wins!
fun.mostViewedGroup: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed group with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mostViewedSoloist: Fun Fact: {{artist}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed solo artist with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mostViewedVideo: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} is the {{ordinalNum}} most viewed video with {{views}} total YouTube views!
fun.mvViewMilestone: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} recently reached {{views}} views on YouTube!
fun.newMV: New Song Alert: Check out this recently released music video, {{hyperlink}}
fun.oldMV: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} was released this week back in {{year}}!
fun.recentGaonWeekly: Fun Fact: {{songName}} is the {{ordinalNum}} highest charting song on the Gaon Weekly charts last week!
fun.recentMusicShowWin: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} recently won on {{musicShow}} on {{winDate}}
fun.viewsByArtistType: Fun Fact: There is a combined total of {{totalViews}} views on all K-Pop music videos on YouTube, {{groupViews}} ({{groupProportion}}%) of which are from groups, while {{soloViews}} ({{soloProportion}}%) are from solo artists.
fun.viewsByGender: Fun Fact: There is a combined total of {{totalViews}} views on all K-Pop music videos on YouTube, {{maleViews}} ({{maleProportion}}%) of which are from male groups, {{femaleViews}} ({{femaleProportion}}%) from female groups, and the remaining {{coedViews}} ({{coedProportion}}%) from co-ed groups.

kmq.guessRate: Fun Fact: {{hyperlink}} has a guess rate of {{percentage}}% over {{roundsPlayed}} rounds played
kmq.highestLeveledPlayerStats: Fun Fact: The {{ordinalNum}} highest leveled KMQ player is Level {{level}}, with {{songsGuessed}} songs guessed over {{gamesPlayed}} games!
kmq.longestGame: KMQ Fact: The world's (current) longest game of KMQ lasted {{sessionLength}} minutes, with {{roundsPlayed}} songs played, an average guess time of {{avgGuessTime}} seconds, with {{numParticipants}} participants! Can you beat that?
kmq.mostActivePlayerGamesPlayed: KMQ Fact: The most active player has played {{gamesPlayed}} games since Nov 8th, 2020!
kmq.mostActivePlayerSongsGuessed: KMQ Fact: The most active player has guessed {{songsGuessed}} songs since Nov 8th, 2020!
kmq.mostActiveServer: KMQ Fact: The most active server has played {{gamesPlayed}} games of KMQ, with a total of {{songsGuessed}} songs guessed!
kmq.mostCorrectGuessesServer: KMQ Fact: The server with the most correct guesses has played {{gamesPlayed}} games of KMQ, with a total of {{songsGuessed}} songs guessed!
kmq.recentGameCount: KMQ Fact: There has been a total of {{recentGameCount}} games of KMQ have been played in the last week!
kmq.recentSessions: KMQ Fact: A total of {{recentSessions}} games of KMQ have been played in the last week!
kmq.totalGames: KMQ Fact: A grand total of {{totalGamesPlayed}} games of KMQ have been played!
kmq.uniquePlayers: KMQ Fact: {{recentActivePlayers}} unique players have played KMQ in the past {{xDays}}!

One or more of the given {{conflictingOptionOne}} is already included in {{conflictingOptionTwo}}.

Use {{solutionStepOne}} and then {{solutionStepTwo}} {{allowOrPrevent}}.

interaction.alreadyEliminated: You've already been eliminated this round.

preCheck.title: Wait...

restart.description_hard: Downtime will be approximately {{downtimeMinutes}} minutes. Please end the current game to ensure your progress is saved!
restart.description_soft: Downtime will be a few seconds, but your game will end. Please end the current game to ensure your progress is saved!
restart.title: Upcoming Restart in {{timeUntilRestart}} Minutes.

sendingBookmarkedSongs.description:
Sending {{songs}} to {{players}}.

Bookmark songs during the game by right-clicking the song message and selecting `Apps > Bookmark Song`
sendingBookmarkedSongs.title: Sending Bookmarked Songs...

uniqueSongsReset.description: All songs have been played. {{totalSongCount}} songs will be reshuffled.
uniqueSongsReset.title: Resetting Unique Songs
